pages.text: During $(thing)snowfall$(), snow can accumulate on exposed $(thing)Roof Tile$() blocks. Blocks with varying amount of snow are visually different. When the snow is accumulating, lower part of a roof will tend to get more snow.

pages.title: Managing Snow
pages.text: $(item)Shovels$() can be used to remove snow from $(thing)Roof Tiles$(), while $(item)Snowballs$() will add snow.
